# GitHub Actions Badges

Add the following badges to the top of your project's `README.md` to showcase CI/CD status.

## CI Status Badge

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
```

Example:
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/workflows/CI/badge.svg)

---

## Code Coverage Badge

After configuring Codecov:

```markdown
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision)
```

Example:
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision)

---

## License Badge

```markdown
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
```

Example:
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)

---

## Rust Version Badge

```markdown
[![Rust](https://img.shields.io/badge/rust-1.70%2B-orange.svg)](https://www.rust-lang.org)
```

Example:
[![Rust](https://img.shields.io/badge/rust-1.70%2B-orange.svg)](https://www.rust-lang.org)

---

## Complete Example

Add to the top of your README.md:

```markdown
# CORINT Decision Engine

![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/corint-decision)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![Rust](https://img.shields.io/badge/rust-1.70%2B-orange.svg)](https://www.rust-lang.org)

AI-powered risk decision engine with natural language policy definitions.
```

**Note**: Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username or organization name.
